entry.title: Sex Addicts Anonymous Basic Text - Soft Cover Pocket Edition
entry.summary:
Vendor: SAA
Type: Books
Price: 19.95

Sex Addicts Anonymous, soft cover pocket edition-Â - This is the official basic text of SAA. In this book, members, groups, and the general public will find the SAA program of recovery drawn and written from the experience, strength, and hope of the fellowship.

entry.title: Facing Love Addiction: Giving Yourself the Power to Change the Way You Love, by Pia Mellody
entry.summary:
Vendor: None
Type: Books
Price: 16.95

This groundbreaking exploration from the author of the best-selling "Facing Codependence and Breaking Free" unravels the intricate and debilitating dynamics of co-addicted relationships.

Mellody clearly outlines the "toxic" patterns played out by Love Addicts and the unresponsive Avoidance Addicts to whom they are painfully and repeatedly drawn. She shares personal experience and real case histories that clarify the distinctions between codependence (how our relationship with our self fails) and co-addiction (how our relations with others become unhealthy entanglements) describe how "love at first sight" can be the first step in the addictive cycle of attraction, fantasy, denial, and obsession show how childhood experiences of abandonment or engulfment influence our choice of romantic partners, friends, and associates detail the tango-like way that addicts activate one another's primary fears and literally "bring out the worst in each other."

entry.title: Sexual Anorexia: Overcoming Sexual Self-Hatred
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hazelden
Type: Books
Price: 16.95

A first-time examination of sexual anorexia, an extreme fear of sexual intimacy and obsessive avoidance of sex, by the acknowledged leader in the treatment of compulsive sexual behavior and recovery.

Author Dr. Patrick Carnes begins by defining sexual anorexia and demonstrating how it and it's parallel disorder, sexual addiction and compulsivity, often arise from a background of childhood sexual trauma, neglect, and other forms of abuse, Carnes explores the numerous dimensions of sexual health, examining key issues which must be addressed and resolved for recovery to proceed. Utilizing extensive research and elucidating case studies, Carnes develops concrete tasks and plans for restoring nurturing and sensuality, building fulfilling relationships, exploring intimacy, and creating healthy sexuality. Woven throughout the book are stories of recovery which illustrate sexual healing principles, model new behavior, and support motivation for change.Sexual Anorexia enables those suffering from this disorder to recognize that sex need not be a furtive enemy to be fought and defeated but, instead, a deeply sensual, passionate, fulfilling, and spiritual experience that all human beings are innately entitled to.

Patrick Carnes, Ph.D., the best-selling author of Out of the Shadows and Contrary to Love, is an internationally known speaker and writer on sexual dysfunction and recovery. He is currently Clinical Director of Sexual Disorders at The Meadows, a treatment facility that works with clients who deal with a wide range of behavior disorders, addiction, and psychological conditions.

entry.title: Sexaholics Anonymous Basic Text
entry.summary:
Vendor: SA
Type: Books
Price: 16.95

The basic text for Sexaholics Anonymous. This book is for those who want to stop their sexually self-destructive thinking and behavior. It was written piece by piece as the need arose during the emergence and growth of SA. In this book we describe how these principles are working for us. When based on a foundation of sexual sobriety and put into personal action, the Twelve Steps and Twelve Traditions become the beginning of a whole new way of life.

entry.title: Sex & Love Addicts Anonymous Basic Text, Softcover
entry.summary:
Vendor: Augustine Fellowship
Type: Books
Price: 24.95

The Basic Text for the Augustine Fellowship, Sex and Love Addicts Anonymous
Author: SLAA

Softcover, 280 pages

The basic text describing how this Twelve Step fellowship interprets AA's program to give support to recovering sex addicts. Includes many personal stories.

entry.title: Out of the Shadows Understanding Sexual Addiction Softcover
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hazelden
Type: Books
Price: 16.95

Out of the Shadows, the first work ever published on sexual addiction, remains the premier text in the field. It is a compelling, breakthrough work offering hope for those who had no hope and insight for those who want to learn how and why this addiction occurs. Dr. Carnes examines the tangled web of love, addictive sex, hate and fear that is usually founded in family relationships. He details what happens and what to expect when sexual addiction is present. And he offers a way for addicts and codependents to deal with their sexual compulsions, as well as their whole life, to become more whole human beings.

entry.title: Hope and Recovery: A Twelve Step Guide for Healing from Compulsive Sexual Behavior
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hazelden
Type: Books
Price: 18.95

A remarkable work, Hope and Recovery guides and supports the life-transforming move from self-defeating and destructive sexual behavior to healthy, affirming sexuality. This widely acclaimed contribution to addiction literature applies the Twelve Step Program of Alcoholics Anonymous to the complex problem of sex addiction.
